item.description: We’ve been here many times and our visit has always been fantastic. A great way to start the Labor Day weekend! As usual, they’ll have delicious hors d’oeuvres. No charge. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions: I 84 Exit 39 Farmington (Rt. 4), turn right onto Rt. 10, go about 6 miles to Rt. 44, facility directly across the street.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Happy Hour
